group_1.textLeft: Feeling better now...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, thanks... @That helps...

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:102102:lipSynch_1]I'm glad you made it back... Thanks for that.

group_1.textRight: I heard you went through a rough patch too...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
Everyone that's here now is all that's left of @Torayamachi.
I'm a Janomiya girl, though~
So, what did you call us over for? You sounded like @you were in a hurry on the phone.

group_1.textRight: It's obvious that there'll be a big commotion if this @girl just shows up at home after all this time.
And she'll probably end up in the hospital for a while.
So she wanted to tell us something before that.

group_1.textLeft: What happened while you were away...?

group_1.textRight: My phone broke and I ran out of money.
The police wouldn't lend me any money, and @strangers are scary.
I got into so much trouble...
I even thought about getting myself on the news so I could be taken home in a police car.
It doesn't matter right now... There's something @more important I have to tell you.

group_1.textLeft: You mean... you found out...

group_1.textRight: Yes...
First, take a look at this.

group_1.textLeft: What's... with that outfit...?

group_1.textRight: While I was chasing that witch, I ended up in a city called Kamihama.

group_1.textLeft: That's that new city that suffered a huge disaster recently, right...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
There was an organization in the city called the Wings of Magius, and they wore robes like this...

group_1.textLeft: An organization...?

group_1.textRight: Yes, formed and run by Magical Girls...

group_1.textLeft: What were they doing...?

group_1.narration: Their objective was the release of Magical Girls. In other @words, to save them from their fate of becoming witches.
To do that, they protected the Rumors of the city and @captured witches.
No one used a single Grief Seed there.
But, instead of transforming to witches, they were able to @summon what was called a Doppel.
The city had become heaven on earth for Magical Girls. @There, you never turn into a witch, @even if you don't fight them.
I joined the group as a Black Feather, one of the low-level @members, so I wasn't told exactly how everything worked. I @was just a pawn for the sake of the release of Magical Girls.
I didn't learn the truth until the day Eve went out of control @and Walpurgisnacht arrived in the city, which caused the @disaster you mentioned.
After that, the Magius fell apart, and all their secrets were @revealed. That was when I learned the truth...

group_1.textCenter: For the sake of their release, they lured witches to @the city from all across the country!
They weren't thinking about what might happen to Magical Girls in other cities.
They were just thoughtlessly gathering witches for themselves!

group_1.textLeft: ... The other Magical Girls in the organization, @were they okay with that?

group_1.textRight: The truth had been hidden until the organization collapsed, and everyone working as a Black Feather @was pretty weak.
So I think everyone was focused more on saving themselves than about the other cities...
Plus, if their system had been successful, it was supposed to spread over every part of the country.
Which means all the other Magical Girls would have been saved by the time every member got back to @their hometown...

group_1.textLeft: So, are things different now...?
The Magical Girls here in Futatsugi City, are we never going to transform into witches...?

group_1.textRight: There was another group of Magical Girls in @Kamihama who somehow knew that the system,
would require hundreds of thousands of @human lives to be sacrificed.
To avoid that atrocity from being born, they put a @stop to the release of Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: That many people died there...? That's a massacre...
Was there no way to get around that...?

group_1.textRight: But that system is still active in Kamihama.
And we gained nothing for what we'd lost to create @that system!
They destroyed their city and killed so many people @and Magical Girls!
And they're the only ones who benefitted from it!
Yuna...!
I can't stand it... I just can't...!
Hey, what's wrong...?

group_1.textLeft: So this is what it feels like to want to kill someone...

group_1.textRight: Yuna...

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru...

group_1.textRight: Y-Yes...

group_1.textLeft: Call Juri out to the Monzen Bridge.

group_1.textRight: B-But Yuna, you're...

group_1.textLeft: Do it now!

group_1.textRight: Yes!

group_1.textLeft: Ao...
I need some proof about Kamihama.
You go find Kyubey and bring it to me.
You said before that you didn't know where it was.
But you should know now.

group_1.textRight: Um... I'm a Janomiya member, though~

group_1.textLeft: Ao...

group_1.textRight: ....O-Okay, I'll do that~

group_1.textLeft: Now, I need you to tell me more.
What are the Magical Girls in Kamihama doing @now...?

group_1.textRight: The Magius and those that stopped them, @they're both working together now.

group_1.textLeft: They're playing nice with them so they can remain @safe from turning into witches...?

group_1.textRight: I heard they want to share their "Automatic @Purification System" with the rest of the world.

group_1.textLeft: How idealistic of them.

group_1.textCenter: Yuna... are we going to help them do that?

group_1.textRight: No way...

group_1.narration: The voices of the girls we lost... they're echoing @inside my head right now...
